Exaggerate: The claim may be seen as an exaggeration because it implies that Rick Perry joined the Republican Party at a younger age than Ronald Reagan did.

Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Reagan remained a Democrat even as he supported Republican candidates, indicating that party affiliation alone may not accurately reflect one's political beliefs.

Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Reagan was registered as a Democrat until the age of 51, as confirmed by his biographer and the Reagan Presidential Library.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no clear indication of the claim faltering at any point.
